1.content: Anne kissed her boyfriend Niko, as he left for work. Today, it was hot, about mid 80s, and sunny, so Anne decided that she would lay out in the sun. She grabbed a lawn chair and unfolded it in her backyard so it would lay flat. She grabbed the sunscreen and squeezed it into her hand, and began to rub it on her thighs and calves. She rubbed some on her cleavage as well, as she didn't want her precious chest burnt. She grabbed her d cups and jiggled them, giggling. She then put a towel over her face, and fell asleep. Unknown to her...
1.title: Sunny day

info.brief_description: Anne's day takes a turn for the worst (at least for her!).
info.description:
Anne is 5'8 brown haired, brown eyed, with d cups

she is wearing daisy dukes, white tennis shoes, and a tight , super small orange tank top

sex and nudity are allowed

keep her under 60 ft

keep her proportionate
